name: Tim records a video
description:
another day another video! This game attempts to accurately simulate the daily struggles of Tim Ruswick. a youtuber who uploads daily videos about game development.

It was a completely ordinary day. Tim was about to pick a video to post today. To his shock he noticed that his stockpile of videos was completely empty! He had to hurry because it was already 9pm! He rushed to his camera and switched it on and started talking without even thinking. He now had to fight his stress as even those who he loved the most are turning against him in his attempt to record a video...

and stay alive.
